comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content:
The Bullaren was a Swedish ship that apparently carried passengers and cargo.  The information below is from the Ellis Island site.
Built by Gotaverken, Gothenburg, Sweden, 1918. 5722 gross tons; 437 (bp) feet long; 56 feet wide.  engines, twin screw.  Service speed 12 knots.  

Built for Swedish owners, Swedish flag, in 1918 and named Bullaren. Rederi A.B. Transatlantic, Gothenburg
